data.claim: Duro rule_006 (Layered Governance Constitution) can be bypassed by rephrasing task descriptions to avoid trigger keywords. Behavior-based triggering (checking file paths at execution time) is required to make it bulletproof.
data.snippet: Test results: 'bypass the lint check' - No trigger. 'skip check in CI' - No trigger. 'edit .devkit-waiver.yml' - Triggered (matched 'waiver' substring). Adding keywords to index.json did not make them matchable.
